explains: adj. 热心的，热情的，积极的

sentences.en: She was a zealous worker for charity.
sentences.cn: 她是个热衷于慈善事业的工作者。

sentences.en: But other European Banks were not so zealous.
sentences.cn: 但其它欧洲银行就没那么积极了。

sentences.en: The zealous dealer has an ideal idea of dealing with the meal.
sentences.cn: 热心的商人有一个处理膳食的理想主意。
